meta.title: TokenCentric - The Dashboard for Your AI Coding Assistants
meta.description: Desktop app for managing AI context files. Scan projects, edit CLAUDE.md, .cursorrules, copilot-instructions, and more. Real-time token counting with official tokenizers.

hero.title: The Dashboard for Your
hero.description: See all your CLAUDE.md, .cursorrules, and copilot-instructions files in one place. Real-time token counting, built-in templates, and a beautiful editor. Free forever.

preview.selectFile: Select a context file to edit

features.title: Everything you need to manage AI context
features.description: One app for all your AI coding assistants. Scan, edit, count tokens, and manage context files across every project.

multiTool.title: Multi-Tool Support
multiTool.description: Claude Code, Cursor, GitHub Copilot, Windsurf, OpenAI - all in one place. Each tool gets its own icon and tokenizer.

tokenCounting.title: Real Token Counts
tokenCounting.description: Accurate counts using official tokenizers: @anthropic-ai/tokenizer for Claude, tiktoken for OpenAI-based tools.

hierarchy.title: Hierarchy View
hierarchy.description: See the full inheritance chain: global config, project files, subfolder overrides. Know exactly what context your AI sees.

editor.title: Monaco Editor
editor.description: VS Code's editor with syntax highlighting, markdown preview, and keyboard shortcuts. Edit context files without leaving the app.

templates.title: 7 Built-in Templates
templates.description: Full-Stack JS, Python, Monorepo, API, Mobile, and more. Start new projects with proven configurations.

darkMode.title: Dark Mode
darkMode.description: Automatic theme detection with manual override. Looks great day and night.

autoUpdate.title: Auto Updates
autoUpdate.description: Always stay current. Updates download in the background and install when you restart.

free.title: 100% Free
free.description: No premium tier, no subscriptions, no limits. Open source and free forever.

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.description: Manage all your AI context files in three simple steps.

scan.title: Scan Your Projects
scan.description: Point TokenCentric at your code directories. It finds all AI context files automatically: CLAUDE.md, .cursorrules, copilot-instructions.md, and more.

edit.title: Edit with Confidence
edit.description: See real-time token counts as you type. Color-coded indicators warn when files get too large. Preview markdown side-by-side.

manage.title: Manage Everything
manage.description: Create new files from templates, duplicate configs across projects, and keep your AI instructions organized and optimized.

tools.title: Works with all major AI tools
tools.description: TokenCentric detects and manages context files for every AI coding assistant you use.

cta.title: Ready to organize your AI context?
cta.description: Download TokenCentric and take control of your AI coding assistant configurations.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: TokenCentric is a free, open-source desktop application developed by Helsky Labs. We are committed to protecting your privacy and being transparent about how the app works.
privacy.notCollect1: No personal data - We never collect your name, email, or any personal information
privacy.notCollect2: No file contents - Your code, context files, and project content never leave your machine
privacy.notCollect3: No project paths - Directory structures and file paths are never transmitted
privacy.notCollect4: No keystrokes or editing behavior - What you type stays on your computer
privacy.collectIntro: TokenCentric collects minimal, anonymous usage analytics to help us understand how the app is used and improve it. This data is sent to our self-hosted Umami analytics instance.
privacy.anonymousIdDesc: When you first launch TokenCentric, a random 16-character hexadecimal string is generated and stored locally on your machine. This ID is not linked to any personal information - it's purely random and used only to distinguish unique devices in aggregate analytics.
privacy.eventsIntro: The following events may be sent: app launch, file creation, scan completion, template usage, and settings changes.
privacy.metadataDesc: Each event includes: app version (e.g., "1.0.0"), platform (e.g., "macOS", "Windows"), and locale (e.g., "en-US").
privacy.whereDesc: All analytics data is sent to analytics.helsky-labs.com, a self-hosted Umami instance. Umami is an open-source, privacy-focused analytics platform that does not use cookies and complies with GDPR.
privacy.optOutDesc: You can disable analytics entirely in the app: Open TokenCentric, go to Settings (Cmd+, on macOS), navigate to the Privacy tab, and toggle off "Send anonymous usage data". When opted out, no data is sent to any server.
privacy.storage1: Analytics data is stored on our self-hosted Umami instance
privacy.storage2: The anonymous device ID is stored locally in your system's app data directory
privacy.storage3: No data is shared with third parties
privacy.storage4: No data is sold or used for advertising
privacy.openSourceDesc: TokenCentric is fully open source. You can inspect exactly what data is collected by reviewing the analytics code on GitHub.
privacy.contactDesc: If you have questions about this privacy policy, please open an issue on GitHub.
